title: Johnny Blaze Pack
description:
Collection of comics featuring Johnny Blaze, the original Ghost Rider and human host for the demon Zarathos. The titles in this pack feature Blaze after the Ghost Rider curse was broken and Zarathos had fled his body, but before the events of Ghost Rider: The Hammer Lane mini series.

He starred in two solo series, Blaze and Blaze: Legacy of Blood and teamed up with Ghost Rider (Danny Ketch) in Spirits of Vengeance. These series came out of the Midnight Sons group of horror titles published by Marvel in the 1990s.


Released on http://ComicPirates.info
